item.title: Tania add a quote by Lyall Watson
item.description: "If the brain were so simple we could understand it, we would be so simple we couldn't." -- Lyall Watson

item.title: Tania add a quote by Kent M. Keith
item.description:
"The Paradoxical Commandments
People are illogical, unreasonable, and self-centered. Love them anyway.
If you do good, people will accuse you of selfish ulterior motives. Do good anyway.
If you are successful, you will win false friends and true enemies. Succeed anyway.
The good you do today will be forgotten tomorrow. Do good anyway.
Honesty and frankness make you vulnerable. Be honest and frank anyway.
The biggest men and women with the biggest ideas can be shot down by the smallest men and women with the smallest minds. Think big anyway.
People favor underdogs but follow only top dogs. Fight for a few underdogs anyway.
What you spend years building may be destroyed overnight. Build anyway.
People really need help but may attack you if you do help them. Help people anyway.
Give the world the best you have and you'll get kicked in the teeth. Give the world the best you have anyway." -- Kent M. Keith

item.title: Tania add a quote by kurt vonnegut
item.description: "If I should ever die, God forbid, let this be my epitaph: THE ONLY PROOF HE NEEDED FOR THE EXISTENCE OF GOD WAS MUSIC" -- kurt vonnegut

item.title: Tania add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "There are people in the world so hungry, that God cannot appear to them except in the form of bread." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Tania add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "Let us read, and let us dance; these two amusements will never do any harm to the world." -- Voltaire

item.title: Tania add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "Common sense is not so common." -- Voltaire

item.title: Tania add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "Ice-cream is exquisite. What a pity it isn't illegal." -- Voltaire

item.title: Tania add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "If God did not exist, it would be necessary to invent him." -- Voltaire

item.title: Tania add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Tania add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Tania add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein
